entry.title: The Boy is mine
entry.summary:
Author: OyasumiPunPun

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,243Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: When Minister Derek Hale’s fiery speech promises a world where Omegas are celebrated, not controlled, Stiles doesn’t wait for reform—he brews a lust potion, hacks a penthouse, and breaks in wearing latex, a corset, and a wolf mask.Plan? Make the Alpha his.Reality? Derek doesn’t need magic to take charge.One whip, one knot, and zero regrets later—turns out the real spell was mutual obsession all along.Inspired by Ariana Grande's song. Consensual. Filthy. entry.title: Witchcraft
entry.summary:
Author: lennokki

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,419Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: Outside the canon, but as close to it as possible. Stiles still ended up becoming a sorcerer after all the druids, the rowan ash, and all the other ridiculous nonsense. And sooner or later his powers were bound to slip out of control. Derek knew that; it was Derek who got the chance to quiet the storm. Damn Stiles and his damn experiments.

entry.title: Keystone Species
entry.summary:
Author: SpaceflowerGrace

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,593Chapters: 9/12Kudos: 123

Summary: They didn't talk much about why Stiles was back in town. His mother had been inordinately proud of that fact she went into labor and delivered Stiles alone in the woods. It was the eighties, she couldn’t exactly call her husband on her cell phone. Stiles was born healthy in the preserve. Scott got hurt. Scott is Stiles to protect. He always has been. Stiles is pissed about quite a few things. “Scott is my fifteen year old cousin! And you hurt him and then left him alone and hurt? What’s wrong with you?” He has gotten very close to Derek’s face. Stiles takes a breath and turns away. Or- what if Stiles was the responsible adult at home?

entry.title: 'cause being your punchline still is something
entry.summary:
Author: whiry

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,992Chapters: 7/21Kudos: 106

Summary: Born into a world of the supernatural and forced to segregate himself and his human peers from the supernatural creatures that inhabit Beacon Hills, Stiles grew up with the belief that integration was the key to a better life, thanks to his mother’s social work. Of course, that belief is only furthered by the mate mark he bears of his mate’s first words to him, something only supernatural creatures and their occasional human mates are supposed to have. Desperate to find his mate and carry on his mother’s work after her death, Stiles does everything in his power to unite his town, even if that means enduring dinners with Derek Hale, who hates him and refuses to speak to him. After a terse interaction, Derek finally speaks and the two realize they’re mates. Well, surely Stiles can still get his happy ending. Right?

entry.title: I Wanna Be Yours
entry.summary:
Author: Taintedtricked

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,066Chapters: 2/6Kudos: 21

Summary: Stiles never meant to fall for Derek Hale — the brooding, half-feral werewolf who grunts more than he talks and looks at him like he’s both a headache and a heartbeat. But somewhere between burnt coffee, pack crises, and late nights spent patching each other up, Stiles realizes he doesn’t just want to be in Derek’s orbit — he wants to be his. Derek’s spent his life building walls so no one can get close enough to hurt him again. But Stiles is persistent, sunlight in human form, and Derek’s starting to wonder if maybe it’s okay to want warmth. Secrets held too long begin to unravel, and somewhere between the noise and the silence, they find it — the quiet truth neither of them can ignore. “Maybe I just wanna be yours.” A slow-burn Sterek story inspired by I Wanna Be Yours by Arctic Monkeys — all coffee, comfort, and confessions you never meant to say out loud.

entry.title: On the Threshold
entry.summary:
Author: Chronojourner

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 110,856Chapters: 50/50Kudos: 345

Summary: Stiles Stilinski is having a bad day. One minute he's in Derek's loft and the next he's on a TV studio set, where he and his friends are a television show and people who look exactly like them are the actors. Dylan O'Brien isn't fairing much better. Transported from the safety of his TV studio to a world where werewolves actually exist and the characters from his show come to life around him, he has to cope not only with werewolves, but also with Druids, werecoyotes, and at least one fairy who definitely doesn't sparkle. As more and more people are swapped between our universe and the universe of Teen Wolf, the fabric of time and space begins to unravel. It is up to the cast and characters of the show to figure out what is causing the problem and to fix it before the two universes are irreversibly damaged.

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 1
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,685Chapters: 13/15Kudos: 193

Summary: Prompt: Coffee shop Au where the owner is increasingly concerned about the amount of caffeine this customer is ingesting.Derek returned to Beacon Hills with his sister once she’d finished college. He’d attended business school for a few years and decided that he’d open his own coffee shop: All Hale Caffeine - Laura picked it. They had gotten the shop up and running while visiting his uncle who was slowly starting to get better and working on rebuilding the old house. After all, it was time to start living again.Stiles Stilinski was 17, a spark, and just trying to finish high school. That proves impossible when his best friend gets bitten by a rogue alpha. Queue the Hales entering their lives as Stiles and Scott deal with the mess they’ve found themselves in. At least Stiles is getting good coffee out of this ordeal - if only the Sourwolf owner would stop commenting on his health.A Season 1 AU Rewrite - where the Hales return two-ish years before season 1’s events. Peter doesn’t go insane, Scott still gets bitten, and Stiles already knows about the supernatural world. Oh, and Derek had actual therapy while in New York.

entry.title: The Loquacious Fingers
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,835Chapters: 2/11Kudos: 41

Summary: Derek Hale didn’t expect getting lost in his own neighborhood to change anything, until the night he frightened a stranger in a dark alley without meaning to. Stiles Stilinski is deaf, skittish, stubborn, all sharp eyes and quiet panic, a notebook clutched to his chest, and a silence Derek doesn’t understand until much later. Soon Stiles is stepping into Derek’s messy loft, borrowing his books, drinking his tea, and filling Derek’s quiet spaces with the warm, steady presence Derek didn’t know he needed. Things begin to get tricky when Derek realizes that his erotic stories more and more star Stiles instead of the usual sexy female heroine. Then one day, Stiles is curled on Derek’s couch reading the manuscript he never intended anyone to see. Derek isn’t sure what terrifies him more: getting lost in the dark with no one to help or Stiles recognizing the pieces of himself hidden in the pages.

entry.title: The Spark of Bastet
entry.summary:
Author: Love_to_Ship7

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,393Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 683

Summary: Ruthless hunters take Sheriff Stilinski and the pack hostage. They kidnap Stiles intending to eliminate him, but they don't know the whole story.
